card.title: The Perfect Setting
card.paragraph1: Imagine celebrating love at Rio de Janeiro's most iconic hotel — where every detail breathes elegance, history and sophistication. The Copacabana Palace is more than a setting: it is a symbol of glamour and tradition that transforms your big day into an unforgettable event.
card.paragraph2: With the expertise of Leco Biagioni's office, the impossible becomes reality. From the ceremony to the majestic ballrooms, every moment is planned to reflect the exclusivity that a wedding at this legendary address deserves.
card.paragraph3: A Party Just Like at Your Home!
card.paragraph4: Fulfill the dream of saying 'I do' in one of the most desired places in the world — and immortalize your story with charm, luxury and perfection.

about.title: About Us
about.name: Leco Biagioni
about.description: Our advisory and ceremonial team, led by Leco Biagioni, is here to transform your wedding into a unique and unforgettable experience. With years of experience and an eye for detail, we ensure that every moment is perfect. Leco Biagioni works with the best suppliers in the market, and the couple will have their advisory from start to finish.
